headline: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, etc.
description: Results-driven professional specializing in front-end web architecture, development and design. Develops well-designed, accessible and standards-based web sites and apps. Highly effective communicator and team leader. Manages multiple projects or teams to successful deployment. Visionary developer with a keen understanding of business priorities and demonstrated expertise in rapidly advancing business goals to revenue-producing activities.
specialties: Extensive knowledge of HTML and CSS, including HTML5 and CSS3
Experience with front-end frameworks including Bootstrap and Foundation
In-depth knowledge of JavaScript and TypeScript
Proficient in JS framework libraries including ReactJS, Angular, AngularJS, Redux and LoDash
Thorough grasp of cross-platform, cross-browser compatibility issues and code optimization
In-depth knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite tools including: Photoshop, Illustrator, Acrobat Pro and InDesign
In-depth experience with build systems including Webpack, Gulp.js and Grunt.js.
Experience with package managers including NPM and bower.io
Extensive knowledge of CMS & WordPress Development
Organized, highly motivated, and detail-directed problem solver
Goal-oriented individual with strong leadership capabilities
12+ years of management experience including 2 years of multi-unit management
Bilingual in spoken and written Spanish

experience.company: Resi Media, LLC (formerly Living As One)

roles.title: Technical Leader, UI Architect
description: UI Architect for the Cisco Webex design system(Momentum Design), including the Momentum UI libraries and the Momentum.Design website.
Led a team of front end developers to create and maintain the Momentum UI Libraries, which include over 60 reusable components, implemented in HTML/CSS, React, Angular and AngularJS.
Architected component modules and their interactions, defined capabilities at each level of the stack, reusability, scale and performance
Wrote code, prototyped reference architectures, built base / core modules for the platform frontend using cutting edge technology stacks
Researched trending and potential future technologies and brought them in to advance the platform
Solved some of our businessâ€™ most critical visual technical challenges, providing simple solutions to complex visual and usability challenges
Translated high level requirements to actionable tasks / deliverables
Worked along with UX, product management and senior leadership teams, while also mentoring and guiding the frontend / application engineering team

roles.title: UI Engineering Manager
description: Managed team of UI Engineers developing a B2B Administrative application
Managed features and initiatives to completion
Prepared definition of ready plans for new features

roles.title: Lead UI Development Engineer
description: Develop and manage custom front-end framework based on Foundation 5.
Write modular LESS and Sass based CSS.
Create custom Angular components/widgets.
Program and manage grunt and gulp build systems for large-scale Angular application.
Collaborate with UX/UE and Product team on design requirements and solutions.
Evaluate, develop and showcase the latest technologies.
Champion new ideas and the adoption of new technologies within the larger organization.
Understand the business, the customer's motivations, and the competition.
Mentor junior team members

roles.title: Lead User Interface Developer
description: Developed the search engine and performance optimized front-end (HTML, CSS, and JS) for business and eCommerce Website
Developed front end web applications using Backbone.js, Handlebars.js, Require.js, Grunt.js, LESS, Sass, and other front end libraries and frameworks
Led team of 40+ front end developers on 24 Agile teams
Created and developed front end ui framework used by up to 24 teams on B2B program
Carried out W3C validation, code reviews, accessibility and usability audits and tests, debugging, and Website maintenance / support
Implemented rapid changes to meet changing business and marketing requirements
Constantly assessed, evaluated, and integrated best practices and industry innovations in web development
Analyzed and optimized pages and page design for maximum performance
Brainstormed with UI/UX team on design requirements and solutions
Developed functional and technical documentation on assigned projects

roles.title: Lead User Interface Developer
description: Responsible for design & development of web-based applications with rich user interfaces.
Gathered, interpreted and implemented technical requirements in a consistent and effective manner.
Developed, modified, wrote and implemented user interfaces for large scale websites and applications
Led team of four in development, testing, debugging, and maintenance of dynamic and secure websites and web-based applications, including widgets, templates, and microsites
Works with technical, design, business, and editorial staff to create applications and pages
Developed Facebook Apps
Developed WordPress Themes and Plugins
Researched current industry trends, and assisted with development and promotion of coding best practices within team and industry
Clients included: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, NBC, World Vision Canada, Louisville Slugger and more

roles.title: Owner
description: Design and Develop SEO friendly Small Business and Non-profit websites and social media. Create websites that convert visitors into customers.

volunteer.title: Team Captain for Annual Pledge Campaign
